laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B test
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative)

Normal liver. Common bile duct shows minimal enhancement. CBD measures 9 mm. Gallbladder has a 14-mm stone, distended with trace pericholecystic fluid. Pancreas, spleen, and adrenals are normal. Tiny renal cysts bilaterally, largest measuring 7 mm. No free fluid, free air, or adenopathy.
